inertia.name: Agar Art
inertia.desc: Keep aside paint brush, colours, pencil and eraser. Show your skills using petri dish, microbes and agar!

inertia.name: Virtual Stock Market
inertia.desc: The market is mock, but the rewards will be real. Invest in virtual stock and become a bull or a bear!

inertia.name: Chem E-Jeopardy
inertia.desc: Your wit and skills are reactants, the competition is the catalyst! Use them rightly to achieve the substance of success!

inertia.name: Monopoly
inertia.desc: Use your skills, knowledge and luck of dice. Take correct steps to win or pay a price!

inertia.name: Science-Trivia
inertia.desc: Collect the gold in form of knowledge. After digging deep in your education mines the gold maybe buried found at corners. Search hard to win this trivia of science!

inertia.name: Chemi-emoji
inertia.desc: The equation of winning should be done fast! So be quick, the answer should be as perfect as your emoji’s pick!

inertia.name: SHARK TANK
inertia.desc: Pitch your idea or product, display the product’s spark. Showcase your entrepreneurship skills to get a deal from the sharks!

swoosh.name: IPL AUCTION
swoosh.desc: Don’t just be a couch cricket pundit just seeing the game,Ananta provides you a chance to create and play your own team.

swoosh.name: BEG BORROW STEAL
swoosh.desc: Collect listed item to complete your deal, Beg it, Borrow it or just steal

swoosh.name: SQUID GAME
swoosh.desc: Contest with numerous opponents,The winner will be the one who survived,The thrill and excitement will be same as series,Just your death is deprived ;)

swoosh.name: ROADIES
swoosh.desc: Contest with numerous opponents,The winner will be the one who survived,The thrill and excitement will be same as series,Just your death is deprived ;)

swoosh.name: ESCAPE ROOM
swoosh.desc: Room full of puzzles,Time limit is there to tussle,To escape fast you need to hustle,To open door use brain not muscle

swoosh.name: DOUCHE BALL
swoosh.desc: Jump, Duck, Move - Do whatever fits you,All this before the ball hits you

swoosh.desc: Snake-O-Mystery is a game of snakes and ladders with a twist. The game is played on a board with 100 squares. The board is divided into 10 rows and

swoosh.name: Membric
swoosh.desc: Membric is a game of snakes and ladders with a twist. The game is played on a board with 100 squares. The board is divided into 10 rows and 10 columns.

swoosh.desc: Anime Battle is a battle royale game, developed by 111dots Studio and published by Garena for Android and

swoosh.name: Valorant
swoosh.desc: Valorant is a free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter developed and published by Riot Games. The game is a tactical first-person shooter

swoosh.name: Treasure Hunt
swoosh.desc: Treasure Hunt is a free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter developed and published by Riot Games. The game is a tactical first-person shooter

kalakriti.name: Deep Racer
kalakriti.desc: Developers of all skill levels can get hands on with machine learning through a cloud based 3D racing simulator, fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, and global racing league.

kalakriti.name: Power BI
kalakriti.desc: Power BI is a business analytics service by Microsoft. It aims to provide interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities with an interface simple enough for end users to create their own reports and dashboards.

kalakriti.name: Tie and Dye
kalakriti.desc: Tie-dye is a term used to describe a number of resist dyeing techniques and the resulting dyed products of these processes.

kalakriti.name: Fluid Art
kalakriti.desc: Whether you want to call it fluid art, liquid art, or acrylic pouring, there’s nothing more satisfying than creating abstract masterpieces by letting pigment run amok.

upshot.name: 7 Up 7 Down
upshot.desc: 7 Up 7 Down is a game of snakes and ladders with a twist. The game is played on a board with 100 squares. The board is divided into 10 rows and 10 columns.
